citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1055 on
14-SEP-17.
The inspector made contact with the Licensee's wife. She was able to confirm that no one was available for
inspection at that time.

narrative:
